name: MEAL-2025-0001
meal_name: Traditional Afternoon Tea at The Shard
description: Experience traditional British afternoon tea on the 35th floor of The Shard with panoramic views of London. Featuring finger sandwiches, freshly baked scones, and delicate pastries.
menu_highlights: Cucumber sandwiches, Smoked salmon blinis, Freshly baked scones with clotted cream and jam, Selection of fine pastries, Premium tea selection
dietary_options: Vegetarian options available, Gluten-free menu on request, Vegan alternatives
address: Level 31, The Shard, 31 St Thomas St, London SE1 9RY
inclusions: Selection of teas, Finger sandwiches, Scones with clotted cream and jam, Selection of pastries
exclusions: Champagne upgrade, Additional beverages, Service charge
cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before booking
certifications: Food Safety Level 5, Allergen Awareness Certified
ambiance: Elegant dining with floor-to-ceiling windows offering stunning London views
special_features: Live piano music on weekends, Champagne upgrade available
chef_details: Executive Chef trained at Michelin-starred establishments

name: MEAL-2025-0002
description: Explore Camden Market's diverse food scene with a local guide. Taste 8-10 different dishes from around the world while discovering the area's alternative culture and history.
menu_highlights: Authentic dim sum, Gourmet burgers, Artisan cheese, International street food, Craft beer tasting, Local desserts
dietary_options: Vegetarian and vegan options included, Halal options available, Dietary restrictions accommodated
inclusions: All food tastings, Expert guide, Market insights, Water bottle
exclusions: Additional food purchases, Alcoholic beverages, Shopping
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide, Food Safety Certified
ambiance: Vibrant market atmosphere with eclectic mix of vendors
special_features: Street art viewing, Cultural history insights, Local vendor interactions

name: MEAL-2025-0003
meal_name: Gin Tasting Experience at London Distillery
description: Discover the history of gin in London while tasting premium varieties. Learn about botanicals, distillation process, and classic cocktail preparation from master distillers.
menu_highlights: 5 premium gin tastings, Traditional British bar snacks, Artisan tonics and garnishes, Cocktail demonstration
dietary_options: Bar snacks can be customized for dietary requirements
inclusions: 5 gin tastings, Guided tour, Cocktail demonstration, Tonic water and garnishes, Light bar snacks
ambiance: Industrial chic setting with copper stills and exposed brick
special_features: Behind-the-scenes distillery tour, Master distiller sessions, Bottle your own gin option

name: MEAL-2025-0004
description: Explore London's oldest food market with a local expert. Taste artisanal British cheeses, charcuterie, fresh oysters, and traditional treats while learning about the market's 1000-year history.
menu_highlights: Artisan cheeses, Traditional charcuterie, Fresh oysters, Homemade preserves, Craft beer, Traditional British sweets
dietary_options: Vegetarian tastings available, Vegan options, Gluten-free alternatives on request
inclusions: All food tastings, Expert guide, Market history tour, Recipe cards
exclusions: Additional purchases, Full meals, Alcoholic beverages
certifications: Licensed Food Guide, Market Heritage Certified
ambiance: Historic Victorian market with bustling atmosphere
special_features: Meet local producers, Traditional recipes, Historic pub visits

name: MEAL-2025-0005
description: Experience authentic Singaporean cuisine at famous hawker centres. Try 10+ local dishes including Hainanese chicken rice, laksa, char kway teow, and traditional desserts with a local foodie guide.
menu_highlights: Hainanese chicken rice, Laksa, Char kway teow, Satay, Roti prata, Kaya toast, Ice kacang, Teh tarik
dietary_options: Halal options included, Vegetarian dishes available, Spice level customizable
inclusions: All food tastings, Local guide, Traditional drinks, Cultural insights
exclusions: Additional food orders, Alcoholic beverages, Transport
ambiance: Authentic local atmosphere with bustling hawker stalls
special_features: Cooking demonstrations, Local culture insights, Traditional tea ceremony

name: MEAL-2025-0006
description: Discover Singapore's award-winning cocktail scene visiting three premium bars. Learn about local ingredients, mixology techniques, and enjoy crafted cocktails with bar snacks.
menu_highlights: 4 premium cocktails, Artisan bar snacks, Local ingredient tastings, Mixology demonstrations
dietary_options: Bar snacks can accommodate dietary restrictions
inclusions: 4 premium cocktails, Bar snacks at each venue, Expert guide, Transport between bars
certifications: Licensed venues, Responsible service of alcohol certified
ambiance: Sophisticated bar atmosphere with city views
special_features: Award-winning bartenders, Local botanicals education, VIP bar access

name: MEAL-2025-0007
meal_name: Traditional Sunday Roast at Historic London Pub
description: Experience the quintessentially British Sunday roast at a historic 16th-century pub. Enjoy slow-roasted meats, Yorkshire pudding, and seasonal vegetables in an authentic setting.
menu_highlights: Choice of roasted beef, lamb, or chicken, Yorkshire pudding, Roasted vegetables, Gravy, Traditional desserts
dietary_options: Vegetarian roast available, Gluten-free options, Vegan alternatives on request
inclusions: Full Sunday roast, Seasonal vegetables, Yorkshire pudding, Gravy
certifications: Historic England Listed Building, Cask Marque Accredited
ambiance: Historic galleried coaching inn with authentic Tudor atmosphere
special_features: 16th-century architecture, Real ales on tap, Historic significance
chef_details: Traditional British cooking, locally sourced ingredients

name: MEAL-2025-0008
description: Experience authentic Peranakan (Nyonya) cuisine in a heritage shophouse. Enjoy traditional dishes that blend Chinese and Malay culinary traditions with cultural storytelling.
menu_highlights: Ayam buah keluak, Otak-otak, Kueh pie tee, Chap chye, Gula melaka dessert, Traditional Peranakan kueh
dietary_options: Some vegetarian dishes available, Spice levels can be adjusted, Pork-free options
inclusions: Multi-course Peranakan dinner, Cultural storytelling, Traditional tea service
ambiance: Authentic Peranakan shophouse with traditional decor and artifacts
special_features: Cultural heritage storytelling, Traditional music, Peranakan artifacts display
chef_details: Third-generation Peranakan chef specializing in authentic family recipes

name: MEAL-2025-0009
description: Enjoy a sophisticated dinner cruise along the Thames with panoramic views of London's illuminated landmarks. Four-course meal with wine pairings while passing iconic sights.
menu_highlights: Four-course fine dining menu, Wine pairings, Canapés on arrival, Cheese course, Petit fours
dietary_options: Vegetarian menu available, Vegan options on request, Gluten-free alternatives, Special dietary requirements accommodated
address: Westminster Pier, Victoria Embankment, London SW1A 2JH
inclusions: Four-course dinner, Welcome drink, Wine with dinner, Live entertainment, Thames cruise
exclusions: Additional beverages, Premium wine upgrades, Service charge
certifications: Marine & Coastguard Agency Licensed, Food Safety Level 5
ambiance: Elegant dining with panoramic river and city views
special_features: Live jazz music, Illuminated London landmarks, Dancing area, Photography opportunities
chef_details: Executive chef with fine dining experience, seasonal British cuisine focus

name: MEAL-2025-0010
description: Dine under the stars on Singapore's highest rooftop restaurant with 360-degree city views. Contemporary cuisine with Asian influences paired with premium wines and cocktails.
menu_highlights: Pan-seared wagyu beef, Fresh lobster thermidor, Truffle risotto, Molecular gastronomy desserts, Premium wine selection
dietary_options: Vegetarian tasting menu, Vegan options available, Gluten-free alternatives, Kosher meals on request
inclusions: Multi-course dinner, Amuse-bouche, Bread service, Complimentary water
exclusions: Beverages, Wine pairings, Service charge, GST
cancellation_policy: 48-hour cancellation for dinner, 72-hour for groups over 8
certifications: Singapore Restaurant Association Member, Wine Spectator Award
ambiance: Sophisticated rooftop setting with panoramic city and bay views
